transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hi sir.
Executive: Good afternoon ma'am. Good afternoon ma'am.
Customer: Ji sir, ji good afternoon sir.
Executive: Ma'am, main Bhanu baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se Pratiksha ka senior. Aapne uske paas call kiya tha kya aapki company ka IndiaMART mein ka se ke naam se?
Customer: Sir, main sun nahi rahi hun.
Executive: Aapne call kiya tha na unhe Pratiksha ko?
Customer: Ji, ji. Unhone hume call kiya tha.
Executive: Achcha toh achcha okay. Kyunki aapka bhi incoming call aaya tha na aaj ke din. Unhone aapko kal call kiya hoga aapka ek call aaya tha. Toh koi concern hai ma'am isko matlab aapko IndiaMART mein koi problem aa rahi hai?
Customer: Um, nahi as such toh koi problem matlab unke sath maine sara discuss kiya. Fir unhone bola ke video meet pe main aapko dikhaungi kya karna hai. Basically jo emails vgera hai woh sare sir ke paas hai. Woh sare khud karenge jo woh karte hain kyunki IndiaMART zyada wohi handle karte hain. Toh mujhe as such iski koi zyada knowledge hai nahi. So that's why sir aayenge toh woh khud yeh karenge. Hame basically jo calls aati hai woh hamare product ke regarding nahi aati hai.
Executive: Achcha ji.
Customer: Ji, issue.
Executive: Achcha. Koi nahi toh ma'am pata hai aapne na jo bhi haan bataiye aur kya dikkat hai aapko?
Customer: Aur jo WhatsApp pe aate hain na like jo queries vgera hume aati hai woh zyada aati hai like jo hamare website pe woh hota hi nahi hai uski queries aati hai hume.
Executive: Achcha, main samajh gaya ma'am. Jaise aapke paas na jo bhi inquiry ya calls ya buyleads aati hai na matlab aapke dusre products ke aapke paas irrelevancy zyada hai dusre products ke bhi aapke paas aa rahi hai right?
Customer: Ji, ji. Same matlab haan haan. Koi nahi ma'am ek bari na jaise aapne kal aapke number pe ya fir aapke sir ke bhi number pe ek bari connect kar lunga. Main Pratiksha ko bhi bol dunga. Woh bhi aapko call kar legi. Theek hai? Kyunki aaj un logo ka office vaise close hai. Toh kal aap ek bari call karke video meeting pe leke aapka yeh pura catalog hai sahi karwa denge. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay, namaste.
Executive: Haan, jahan pe category mapping vgera kahin correct hogi toh hum sahi karwa denge aapka. Theek hai? Baaki aapki yeh sari cheezein resolve ho jayenge isme koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai? Aap log yeh apne JNK mein hi deal karte hain ya fir all over India deal karte hain?
Customer: Pan India.
Executive: Pan India karte hain na?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai. Pan India karte hain toh ma'am aap log kitne time se IndiaMART pe? Toh main toh aapko suggest karunga ki aap hamari jo TrustSeal services hain uske sath aap log plan kijiye. Wahan se aapko call inquiry aur badh ke milengi. Listing visibility jo hoti hai jis jis aap city district mein buylead consume karoge na woh sari city district mein aapki company ki visibility aayegi. Toh usse aapka aur enhance hoga. Aap ek bari kal hamare sath video meeting pe judiye. Theek hai? Aapke jo primary number pe sir hai. Ma'am hum available nahi hai. Hum occupy hote hain din bhar. So jab sir aayenge toh hum us time video call kar lenge na?
Executive: Haan, main aaj ki baat nahi kar raha hun. Main kal ek bari main bol dunga aapko woh call kar legi. Fir aapke paas apna jo bhi preferable time hoga. Theek hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aap apne hisab se aapka jo bhi perfect time hoga aap apna time bata dena. Haan. Theek hai? Us hisab se apan kar lenge meeting.
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Theek hai? Aur ma'am abhi jaise aapka yeh haan aapne ek call aaya hua tha toh iske regarding aisa hai ki ticket raise ho gaya tha. Theek hai? Toh isko main abhi close kar deta hun. Aapke paas ek feedback ka message jayega jo hamari baat hui hai. Please aap usse satisfy mark kar dijiyega.
Customer: Namaste, thank you ma'am.
Executive: Theek hai? Okay ma'am. Thank you ma'am.
Customer: Okay, thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Calls received are not product related.

- Queries received on WhatsApp are irrelevant.



Resolution:

- Executive assured catalog issues will be resolved.

- Suggested TrustSeal services for better visibility.

- Executive will connect to schedule video meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will schedule a video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, trustseal, irrelevant queries
